HomeWiki:
Project Description
Media Module Management also called Media control for Microsoft Dynamamics CRM.


Description
Media Module Management also called Media control for Microsoft Dynamamics CRM. You can add to any entity in CRM and then publish to try it. It's support for link images, link videos (Direct / Youtube / Vimeo).
It's also support media management like: add, edit, delete media.

Features
1. Set up a list of entities and users are using the Media module.
2. Set the parameters for Media Slideshow.
3. Set the mode of storing images and video
4. Manage photos and videos on each entity (manager can add files as pdf, doc, ....).
5. Slideshow pictures and video.

Please visit from website http://www.crm-appstore.com/products/MediaApp/2013

Or www.tnsolutions.vn

Contact us: info@tnsolutions.vn
